title: Baked beans
ingredients: ['225 g (8 oz) dried haricot beans, soaked for at least 8 hours', '1 tbsp sunflower oil', '5 shallots, finely chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 celery sticks, finely chopped', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 (225g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 tsp dried mixed herbs', '500 ml (17 fl oz) dry cider', '30 g (1 oz) dark muscovado sugar', '1 tbsp black treacle', '1 tsp Dijon mustard', 'salt and pepper', 'sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley to garnish']
